mapper.select: select help_id as helpId, rh.review_id as reviewId, rh.member_id as memberId, help_state as helpState from review_help as rh inner join review as r on rh.review_id =r.review_id where rh.review_id = ${reviewId}
mapper.delete: delete from review_help where review_id = ${reviewId} and member_id = ${memberId}
mapper.select: select count(*) from review where review_grade = ${reviewGrade} and product_id = ${productId}
mapper.update: update review set help = help + 1 where review_id = ${reviewId}
update review set help = help - 1 where review_id = ${reviewId}
mapper.insert: insert into review(review_grade, review_img, review_contents, review_created_date, product_id, member_id) values (#{reviewGrade}, #{reviewImg}, #{reviewContents}, #{reviewCreatedDate}, #{productId}, #{memberId})
